Reviews.Title: This is an extraordinary camera.
Reviews.Author: Lavender
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these to take on vacation to Hawaii. The screen on the back is larger than most and allows one to view the subject more clearly. The camera has many additional features. It is ready to use out of the box and very easy to operate. I had never owned a camera before and yet I was able to use this one with ease. A great value!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: W. hall
Reviews.Content: Love camera, replacement of one I lost, not sure of red color but when it came I love it! Very easy to take pics

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Alyssa
Reviews.Content: I love this camera because it takes clear shots and centers the picture for me . Its easy to use and takes great sport shots.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S4200
Reviews.Author: JohnO
Reviews.Content: just got it and tried many of the different options.movie recorder with audio works but probably better inside as u can hear the wind on the playback. I use the automatic settings and the landscape colors are great. if your fussy there are other options u can try. telephoto works great. installed the cd and transferred pictures with ease. also a lot if good information. great camera for the price. comes with needed cables and battery. battery holddown looks flimsy so use a little care installing the battery.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera !
Reviews.Author: Hunter
Reviews.Content: That's awesome ! I bought it before go travel in Australia. Cheap price and hight quality. I also buy 2 memory cards too. This camera has many features and auto-shoot mode. You can easy to choose quickly and just point and shoot in the real meaning.Remember buy more memory card for this. You will feel lack of storage when shooting too much.Check this link for the cheap memory card, just 7$ for 8Gbhttp://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B007JRB0TC/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B007JRB0TC&linkCode;=as2&tag;=best-refer-20

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Lee Canada
Reviews.Content: This  camera is  a great  little  camera. It takes  very nice pictures. It  has  an assortment  of picture  sizes and  video  types. The instructions  are easy  to understand and  follow. Am really  going to  enjoy  this  camera. This  is our third NIKON camera we have  purchased and  we love  all of  them!!!

Reviews.Title: Point and shoot.  Very easy operation.  Just what my wife ordered.
Reviews.Author: budsims
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted a camera that would take good clear photos but was a point and shoot.  You can/t go wrong with a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Jason C
Reviews.Content: We love our new camera we used it on our most recent trip to Florida. Our daughter loved taking pictures

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4200
Reviews.Author: Forrest Walker
Reviews.Content: I like the huge 3 inch touch screen. Price was great. So far it meets expectations. Came on time with no damage.

Reviews.Title: good pictures, slow turn around
Reviews.Author: vetmom
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and takes good pictures. I like the touch screen and ability to zoom with it. The quality of the pictures definitely decreases as the zoom increases though. Also it seems to take longer than usual (5 - 10 sec) before you can take the next picture. If I has [aid full price, I would be disappointed but got a good deal on Amazon so I'm happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lawrence O.
Reviews.Content: Great camera at a great price.  I bought this camera for my wife to use.  It is simple to use and takes great photos and videos with sound. I bought a separate high capacity Ultra San Disk for extra storage for my wife to use for all of her photo fun!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Judy Naples
Reviews.Content: I just got this little  camera, and I love it!  It is my second Nikon..  I'm still trying to learn all the features, so far it is fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: blumarlin
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a Christmas gift.  The recipient took one picture and the camera then froze with the zoom lens out and a black screen.  Nikon support was of little help.  It was returned.  I did not order a replacement because I am now afraid of that particular model.

Reviews.Title: A great camera for vacation
Reviews.Author: Ernest
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my vacation over the summer. It was well worth buying. It take wonderful pictures and lightweight to carry around. The touch screen is a little sensitive but most touch screens are. I really can't compare it to any other camera because i never really had a digital camera before.

Reviews.Title: Takes horrible pictures
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Horrible indoor and outdoor photos. Do Not buy! You will be disappointed. It also takes forever to take multiple photos.

Reviews.Title: My review
Reviews.Author: B. Jones "Jonesfsu"
Reviews.Content: This is overall a good camera. There is a little problem with the memory card battery area, it does not close perfectly. Otherwise it's good.

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera
Reviews.Author: SheAll
Reviews.Content: Really like our new camera with it's slick color, easy playback & more.  It's lightweight & pictures have such clarity.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Cookpix S4200
Reviews.Author: NWB
Reviews.Content: I like my little Nikon Coolpix.  The only negative so far has been that it's hard to keep some of the pictures from blurring - especially when using the zoom lens.  However, the convenience and ease of use if a real plus over my bulkier digital camera.  The price was a main factor in this purchase and I feel like I got good value for my investment.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: carol dooley
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about getting a digital camera but a relative of mine has a similar one & I needed a camera. This is the best one! So many features, very easy to use, & a good price. I would recommend it to anyone who was in the market.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Bob Shoreman
Reviews.Content: As represented, fast ship.  Takes great pics.  Video works good, too.  Small size makes it easier to carry than my Nikon D3000 with assorted lenses when traveling.  Excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Nike Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Joan Howerton
Reviews.Content: This is the nicest camera I've ever owned.  It's light weight, attractive, and takes beautiful pictures.  Nikon makes a great product.

Reviews.Title: Summer Vaca
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Carroll
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my summer vacation and even though I can't use all the special aspects, I got great photos and I look forward to experimenting with it in the future.

Reviews.Title: Why I love this camera
Reviews.Author: L. Porter
Reviews.Content: I have had many many point and shoot cameras.  This one has unbelievable clarity, focus and zoom. Yet is small, light and cool looking (I have Red).  I just love it

Reviews.Title: blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: Slappy Blanco "you betcha"
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of nice features, clear crisp pictures is not one of them.  Played with the settings for a few days and put on a tripod to make sure it was not me moving and causing the issue.  Nope, its the camera.  Expected much better from a name like Nikon.  Will return this and try a Canon.

Reviews.Title: On time but inoperable
Reviews.Author: Terry Mills "TerryMKC"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera with 1 day delivery so I could use it over the weekend. It showed up in time on Saturday, but I was extremely disappointed because the camera wouldn't turn on and the battery wouldn't charge. It is probably a bad battery but It has a special battery that can't be picked up at a local store in my town, so I was out of luck and without a camera when I wanted it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Miss D.
Reviews.Content: I haven't actually used this camera a whole lot since I bought it, but my impression so far is that it's good.  The pictures are very sharp and I love the touch screen aspect of it.  I do love the color and the compact size; I can take it in my purse with me wherever I go, it's real convenient.  The cons of the camera: the zoom part of the camera is not that great; the closer the object the more blurry it is.  Also, even though it has Image Stabilizing you still have to hold your hand real still when taking a picture to avoid blurriness (this may have to do with its small size, but not sure).  I'm not complaining a whole lot though because I only paid $90 for it, however, had I paid the original $300 price I would be more than likely returning it.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Mitch B.
Reviews.Content: good product....love the 720 P....needs more explaination about use of memory cards (must use 10 gig fast card...not standard 2 gig...not explained) telephoto zoom can't control speed of zoom...all  the same fast zoom in without operator choice ...had to use zoom in post production software to slow down speed

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Carolyn F. Hickox "Carolyn, aunt-in-law"
Reviews.Content: Got this simple to operate camera for my husband and he loves it! Takes great photos and is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S4200 16.0 MP Digital Camera - Red
Reviews.Author: krasimir
Reviews.Content: Create your best photos and HD movies yet with the stylish COOLPIX S4200. With 16 Megapixel CCD sensor, electronic Vibration Reduction (VR) image stabilization system, creative in-camera effects, 20 scene modes and more, you'll achieve beautiful results in any setting. And controlling the camera is a breeze thanks to its intuitive 3.0-in. touch screen. Style and performance, together in harmony.Ultra-slim elegance and intuitive touchHighly capable zoomSpecial effects and Filter effectsCapture the moment in style. Create your best photos and HD movies yet with the stylish COOLPIX S4200. With 16 Megapixel CCD sensor, electronic Vibration Reduction (VR) image stabilization system, creative in-camera effects, 20 scene modes and more, you'll achieve beautiful results in any setting. And controlling the camera is a breeze thanks to its intuitive 3.0-in. touch screen. Style and performance, together in harmony.
